phrs.translation: 达到, 获得, 得到, 完成
达到, 获得, 到达, 理想的状态
获得权力, 得到权力
达到目的, 达到目标
达到, 获得, 也可指达到某一目标, 完成

sentences.sentence: Students with high hope set themselves higher goals and know how to work to attain them.
sentences.translation: 被寄予厚望的学生为自己设定更高的目标，并知道如何努力实现这些目标。

sentences.sentence: Thus they are not able to "experience life" and so they attain a high life span in captivity.
sentences.translation: 因此，他们不能“体验生活”，从而在囚禁中获得了较长的寿命。

sentences.sentence: Many of these people acquired far more experience of exploration than most Europeans could hope to attain.
sentences.translation: 这些人中有很多人获得了探险经验，远比大多数欧洲人希望获得的更多。
